name: OpenAI Codex App
description: OpenAI's multi-agent AI coding desktop app for macOS with project-based context support. Acts as a command center for managing multiple AI agents in parallel for coding tasks with the new GPT-5.3-Codex model.
community_quotes: 200,000 downloads on day one according to Sam Altman
The most capable agentic coding model to date
A powerful command center for building with agents

name: GitHub Copilot Agent HQ & SDK
description: GitHub launched Agent HQ allowing Copilot Pro+ and Enterprise users to run multiple coding agents (Claude, Codex) directly inside GitHub, VS Code, and GitHub Mobile. Also released Copilot SDK for building custom agentic workflows with programmatic access to Copilot CLI's engine.
community_quotes: Run multiple AI coding agents directly inside repository workflows
Pick your agent - use Claude and Codex on Agent HQ
VS Code becomes multi-agent command center for developers

name: Willow for Developers
description: A voice dictation tool specifically built for Cursor & AI IDEs that allows developers to speak their prompts instead of typing them, reportedly 4x faster than typing. Marketed as the fastest way to vibe code.
community_quotes: The fastest way to vibe code
4x faster than typing prompts
117+ upvotes on Product Hunt

name: Snowflake Cortex Code
description: An AI coding agent that understands enterprise data context and provides context-aware assistance for data teams. Integrated into Snowsight with governance and security workflows for ML workflows and data operations.
community_quotes: Dramatically increases productivity for data teams
Understanding enterprise data context
Simplifies all data operations with secure, context-aware capabilities

name: OpenCode
description: An open-source AI coding agent with a native terminal-based UI featuring multi-session support, compatibility with over 75 models, and flexible deployment options (CLI, desktop app, or IDE extension). Positioned as an open-source alternative to proprietary coding tools.
community_quotes: Currently the top AI coding agent out there
Native terminal-based UI for developers
Open-source alternative to proprietary tools

name: Entire Checkpoints
description: An open-source command-line tool launched by ex-GitHub CEO that makes AI-generated code transparent and reviewable. Part of the Entire platform focused on AI code transparency, unveiled with $60 million in seed funding.
community_quotes: $60 million in seed funding
Makes AI-generated code transparent and reviewable
Open-source CLI tool for AI code transparency

name: VS Code Multi-Agent Development
description: Visual Studio Code 1.109 positioned itself as a home for multi-agent development, enabling developers to work with multiple AI agents simultaneously within the IDE. Represents Microsoft's vision for multi-agent command center development.
community_quotes: Your home for multi-agent development
VS Code becomes multi-agent command center for developers

name: BetterBugs MCP
description: An AI debugging tool that provides full bug context across all development tools. Gives AI development tools including Cursor, VS Code, Windsurf, and Claude complete bug context for better debugging workflows.
community_quotes: Full bug context across all your tools
Gives AI dev tools complete bug context

name: Devlop AI
description: An AI-powered IDE specifically designed for embedded systems that writes and flashes STM32 firmware directly to your board, automating the embedded development workflow.
community_quotes: 94 upvotes on launch day
Writes and flashes STM32 firmware
